name: Margherita Pizza
steps: Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface. Transfer to a baking sheet or pizza stone.
Brush olive oil over the dough. Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on top.
Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until the crust is golden and cheese is melted.
Remove from the oven, sprinkle with fresh basil leaves, salt, and black pepper.
Slice and serve your delicious Margherita Pizza!
